title: Emerald & Diamond Grand Collar Necklace - Pancha Ratna Haaram
materials: Pear Cut dangles) - high quality precious gemstones
features: Magnificent collar necklace design featuring an intricate floral-inspired center pendant. Pavé-set diamonds accentuate the design, creating a dazzling effect. Pear shaped emeralds are dangle at the center.
colors: Predominantly white (diamonds) and green (emeralds) with yellow gold accents
occasions: and other special occasions where you desire to make a statement. Also ideal for anniversary gifts and significant celebrations.
description: This 'Pancha Ratna Haaram' boasts exceptional craftsmanship and top-quality materials. The brilliant-cut diamonds capture the light beautifully, while the emeralds add a touch of regal elegance. The meticulous detailing and unique design make it a true heirloom piece, perfect for passing down through generations. Its intricate design and high-quality gemstones guarantee a lasting impression.
